description: This PHP source file handles user logout functionality by clearing session data, logging the logout event, and redirecting to the login page.

methods.name: session_start
methods.description: Starts a new session or resumes an existing one.

methods.name: exec
methods.description: Executes a command on the server shell, used here to log user logout.

methods.name: session_destroy
methods.description: Destroys all data associated with the current session.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Sends a raw HTTP header, used here to redirect the user to the login page.
